enhanced_description: Odilo is a mission-driven company focused on empowering individuals through learning. It enables organizations to provide Unlimited Learning by building personalized learning ecosystems in a frictionless, efficient, and valuable way. Trusted by over 8,500 organizations in more than 50 countries, Odilo helps over 170 million people worldwide accelerate skill development and improve learning efficiency. The platform allows access to a vast content ecosystem or integration of an organization's own content, leverages ODILO AI for adaptive learning based on user habits, and centralizes data in ODILO BI for analytical insights. Odilo also offers professional and growth services to increase user engagement.
competitive_advantages: Centralized learning data and business intelligence (ODILO BI)
Access to a vast global content ecosystem
Ability to integrate custom organizational content
Professional and growth services for increased engagement
Focus on building the 'Unlimited Learning' category
